name: SNOOP: A Hidden Object Game
description:
Looking for a fun, tantalizing workout for your brain? SNOOP gets right down to the core of hidden-object puzzle games and gives you what you really want: a challenging puzzle filled with tons of clues!

Features:
- Each puzzle contains up to 20 clues to keep you snooping around for hours.
- Find the hidden hint in each puzzle to earn a free hint.

Get your sleuth on when you play SNOOP today - and every day!

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK MORE PUZZLES FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
